title: Woman who says she was raped by Russian soldiers shares her story
description: A Ukrainian woman says a Russian soldier dragged her to an empty house and raped her.  CNN's Sara Sidner reports the harrowing story of women who claim that both their homes and their bodies were violated in this war.

title: US candidate tries to deny press entry to his event. How CNN got access
description: CNN's Kyung Lah reports on leading contenders in the crowded Pennsylvania governor's race, and how it could affect the 2024 Presidential election.

title: Missing Alabama inmate, corrections officer in custody in Indiana after chase
description: [Breaking news update, published at 6:05 p.m. ET]

title: Watch the new 'Avatar: Way of Water' trailer
description: Check out the trailer for the much-anticipated "Avatar: Way of Water." The sequel is set to come out thirteen years after the original "Avatar" film premiered.

title: Biden considering visit to East Jerusalem, Israeli official says
description: US President Joe Biden is considering a visit to East Jerusalem during an upcoming visit to Israel, an Israeli official told CNN Monday.

title: Why the US is sanctioning Russian bank executives but not the bank itself
description: The Biden administration has issued a new round of sanctions that target Russian media companies and 27 executives from Gazprombank, one of Russia's largest banks. CNN's Anna Stewart reports.

title: Trump says he has no Trump Organization cell phones and asks judge to end contempt fines
description: Former President Donald Trump said he no longer has four cell phones identified by the New York attorney general's investigation into the Trump Organization's finances but has turned over his personal phone to be searched as he tries to convince a state judge to lift a civil contempt ruling that so far has cost him $140,000.

title: Prince Harry shows off his acting skills in new video
description: The Duke of Sussex starred alongside New Zealand actors Rhys Darby, Dave Fane and Rena Owen in a new video campaign for his nonprofit travel organization Travalyst.

title: Media outlets led by CNN seek access to court filings that House January 6 committee made under seal
description: Eighteen national media outlets led by CNN are asking a court to make public secret court filings in former White House chief of staff Mark Meadows' lawsuit against the House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, US Capitol attack.

title: 'It's a decision for Erling,' Borussia Dortmund CEO says of Haaland's impending departure transfer
description: The race to secure Erling Haaland's signature has been one of the most hotly-contested transfer sagas in recent memory -- and it would seem to still be finally reaching its conclusion.

title: Biden tells top national security officials leaks about intelligence sharing with Ukrainians must stop
description: President Joe Biden recently told his top national security officials that leaks about US intelligence sharing with Ukrainians aren't helpful and need to stop, according to an official familiar with the conversation.

title: Biden signs law aimed at streamlining US military aid to Ukraine
description: President Joe Biden on Monday signed a bill into law aimed at streamlining the process for getting military assistance to Ukraine as Russia continues its invasion.

title: Abortion rights advocates are raising alarms about a nearly century-old state law
James Webb Space Telescope captures sharp views of invisible light
description: The James Webb Space telescope has the sharpest perspective on otherwise invisible light in the universe.

title: What we know about Casey White, the Alabama prisoner who escaped with a corrections officer
description: The murder defendant who escaped from an Alabama detention center with a corrections official on April 29 has previous experience trying to escape prison and winning the trust of his captors.

title: 'It's just not good.' Experts describe the dire situation in Texas as they battle record-breaking temperatures and raging fires
description: In parts of Texas, smoke fills the sky.

title: Volkswagen has already sold out of electric cars in key markets this year
description: Volkswagen Group, the leading global competitor to Tesla, has sold out of electric cars in the United States and Europe this year because of soaring demand and supply constraints.

title: Rivian's stock plunges on report that Ford is selling shares
description: Rivian's stock plunged 13% Monday as early investors jumped at their first opportunity to sell their shares — including, reportedly, Ford.

title: Queen Elizabeth will not open UK Parliament this year, Buckingham Palace says
description: Britain's Queen Elizabeth II will not attend the opening of Parliament on Tuesday due to mobility problems, Buckingham Palace said in a statement on Monday.

title: Ex-Russian PM analyzes Putin's Victory Day speech
description: Former Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Kasyanov, who now supports Ukraine, explains to CNN's Zain Asher why Russian President Vladimir Putin can't declare victory in Ukraine.

title: Ukrainian cultural landmarks suffer fresh blows as another museum is hit
description: Last Friday, the historic home of Ukraine's treasured poet and philosopher Hryhorii Skovoroda was destroyed by a Russian artillery strike, along with a museum of his work.

title: Boris Johnson's unsolvable Brexit problem is coming back to bite him
description: As the British parliament returns on Tuesday to the backdrop of inconclusive local election results and the ongoing "Partygate" scandal now impacting both Boris Johnson and the leader of the opposition Keir Starmer, there's one major headache facing the United Kingdom that might not get the look in it deserves: making Brexit work.

title: Putin's speech keeps the world guessing
Oath Keepers tell Jan. 6 investigators how they communicated with Trump allies
description: Top leaders in the Oath Keepers, the far-right extremist group, have been turning over phones and digital files and sitting for interviews with the FBI -- and detailing how they worked to benefit Donald Trump's campaign and communicated with others in the former President's orbit, according to court records and multiple sources familiar with the federal investigation.

title: Former Ajax striker and Congolese international Jody Lukoki dies aged 29
description: Former Ajax footballer and Congolese international forward Jody Lukoki has died at the age of 29, according to a statement from his club, FC Twente.

title: Russian Ambassador doused with red paint at Soviet cemetery
description: Russian Ambassador to Poland Sergei Andreev was doused with red paint while trying to lay a wreath at the cemetery of Soviet soldiers in Warsaw.  Andreev was accompanied by police out of the cemetery, later saying he was not injured.

title: Making money on crypto? Yes, the IRS expects a cut
description: A lot is changing fast in the world of crypto, including the tax rules.

title: Kendrick Lamar's latest video features uncanny Kanye and Will Smith deepfakes
description: Rapper Kendrick Lamar is causing a stir with the video for "The Heart Part 5," his first single in four years.

title: Russia needs to sell oil. It's running out of options
description: Russia has long been powered by oil and Europe's addiction to it. Now, Moscow is faced with an unprecedented challenge: If the continent bars imports of millions of barrels of crude, can it find new customers?

title: The Middle East won't rescue Europe if it turns off Russian oil
description: As Europe tries to stymie Moscow's war effort in Ukraine by weaning itself off Russia's oil, Middle Eastern nations appear to be the only producers with enough capacity to compensate.

title: More human remains found at Lake Mead as reservoir's water level plunges
description: More human remains were found at Lake Mead over the weekend, less than a week after a body in a barrel was discovered at the reservoir.

title: E1's RaceBird electric powerboat doesn't just float, it 'flies'
description: Among the superyachts and cruise liners in the Monaco marina, there's a new vessel -- one that looks more like a spaceship than a boat.

title: Samoan rugby player Kelly Meafua dies after fall from French bridge
description: Kelly Meafua, a Samoan rugby star, has died after falling from a bridge in France following his team's final game of the season.

title: Priyanka Chopra Jonas and Nick Jonas bring their baby daughter home
description: In honor of Mother's Day, Nick Jonas and his wife Priyanka Chopra Jonas shared the first image of their baby girl.

title: Shanghai intensifies lockdown as Xi Jinping insists on zero-Covid
Drone captures close encounter between surfers and great white shark (2021)
description: Photographer Scott Fairchild captured the moment a great white shark swam past two surfers in the waters near San Diego, CA.

title: Ukrainian teen drives injured men through battlefield despite leg wounds
description: CNN's Isa Soares shares the story of 15-year-old Anastasia, a Ukrainian teen who drove through a battlefield in order to save the lives of two civilian men in critical condition.

title: This teen fled Ukraine with a US citizen. See why they were separated at the US border
description: With her mother's permission, a 17-year-old escaped Ukraine with an American family friend. See why the pair were separated when they arrived at the US-Mexico border, and the journey it took to reunite after she was detained by US immigration.

title: Madrid Open victory is 'best week of my life,' says 19-year-old tennis sensation Carlos Alcaraz
description: If you look up "bursting onto the scene" in the dictionary, it might now come up with a picture of Carlos Alcaraz's face.

title: 8 out of 10 children in Philippines are at risk of online sexual abuse. That poses a challenge for whoever wins the presidency
'The Rock', a record-setting white diamond, goes up for auction
description: The largest white diamond ever auctioned will go under the hammer in Geneva this week, part of a sale by Christie's that features two stones weighing more than 200 carats each.

title: Boeing is losing the plane race. So it packed up and left for Washington
description: Boeing is moving its headquarters from Chicago to a suburb of Washington. But some analysts think this move is one in the wrong direction.

title: 'I want to die': Video shows scenes of desperation from Shanghai's lockdown
description: As residents in Shanghai continue to be forced to live under strict Covid-19 lockdown, some are feeling desperation. CNN's Selina Wang reports.

title: She sat next to the annoying guy on the plane. Then they fell in love
description: The first time Krystina Burton met Gabriel Solberg, she rolled her eyes.

title: Max Verstappen wins inaugural Miami Grand Prix in front of star-studded crowd
description: Max Verstappen won the inaugural Miami Grand Prix on Sunday ahead of championship leader Charles Leclerc.

title: Hong Kong's next leader is a hardline former police officer who took on city's protesters
Why John Lee is different than Hong Kong's previous leaders
description: A largely pro-Beijing committee has tapped John Lee, a former policeman and security chief during the 2019 pro-democracy protests, to be the new chief executive of Hong Kong. CNN's Kristie Lu Stout reports on why Lee is a departure from previous leaders.
